markdownRemark.excerpt: Using webpacker in rails is great, but for some reason old webpacker files do not get deleted… Here is a little script to delete old webpacker files:
markdownRemark.html:
Using webpacker in rails is great, but for some reason old webpacker files do not get deleted…

Here is a little script to delete old webpacker files:

bin/rails webpacker:clobber

frontmatter.title: Rails clobber webpacker files
frontmatter.description: How to clear webpacker files in rails.
